title: push-to-talk transmission colour change in ui isn't noticeable enough
body:
i'm colourblind and i can't notice the change in colours between the transmitting/not-transmitting icon in the ui. i think it should be more obvious like in ts3. there are skins that fix this, but i don't think it should be a problem in the default install.


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/1038/ .
